description: Major biotechnology research thesis. Research to be in a technology or business/law/technology management area. May be undertaken in an Industry or International location. All part-time students must enrol in BIOT8005 over 4 semesters. Students commencing full-time in sem 1 enrol in BIOT8003. Students commencing full-time in sem 2 enrol in BIOT8004. Major biotechnology research thesis. Research to be in a technology or business/law/technology management area. may be undertaken in an Industry or International location.
